Introducing Shiori: A Bootstrap-Based Jekyll Theme

28 Jul 2014

You can customize this section in _includes → post-header.html.

Introduction

Shiori is a Bootstrap-based Jekyll theme. It looks great by default, but you can customize it easily. It supports Bootstrap and Font Awesome classes out of the box.

View on GitHub →

Themes

Shiori comes with these color schemes:

Dark

Turquoise

Green

Blue

Purple

Orange

Red

Author

Shiori is written by Elle Kasai.

Follow @ellekasai

Shiori by Example: Helpful Bootstrap Components

With Shiori, you can take advantage of all the available components in Bootstrap. Here are some useful components for blogging.

Newer

Welcome to Jekyll!

You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
